data_sources.description: Dataset containing information on air quality around the world.

data_variables.description: BigQueryHelper object for accessing the OpenAQ dataset.
DataFrame containing the list of U.S. cities from the OpenAQ dataset.
DataFrame containing distinct countries that use a unit other than ppm to measure pollution.
DataFrame containing distinct pollutants that have a value of exactly 0.
SQL query string to select city names where country is the US.
SQL query to select distinct countries that do not use 'ppm' as a measurement unit.
SQL query to select pollutants that have a value of exactly 0.

data_flow.flow: Used to query the OpenAQ dataset.
Contains U.S. cities data and is used to analyze city measurements.
Contains data on countries and can be used for further analysis.
Contains data on pollutants and can be used for reporting.
